content: the preemie granny lovey is just the right size for the littlest ones it s small enough to be the first handmade blanket for a preemie baby and can easily be altered for a larger or smaller blanket this lovey was designed as part of the preemie crochet challenge hosted by sunflower cottage crochet for every pattern purchased and downloaded during the month of august you agree to make a donate at least one item to a nicu/charity/organization/family during the month of november - national prematurity awareness month the 10-round square features alternating rounds of granny stitch and solid double_crochet a simple cute shell border finishes off the square written in english using us crochet terminology skill level beginner pattern includes detailed written instructions and a crochet chart for stitch placement
